name: Overhead Strike
description: A powerful downward strike. Slow but devastating, difficult to parry.

windUp.description: Attacker raises weapon high overhead, building momentum

committed.description: Weapon descending with full force, cannot be stopped

impact.description: Weapon crashes down on target from above

recovery.description: Long recovery as weapon momentum continues downward, leaving attacker exposed

variablePower.description: Can use 50% less (2 stamina) for weaker/slower attack, or 50% more (4 stamina) for devastating strike

telegraphs.description: Feet plant firmly, stance stabilizing for vertical strike
Shoulders and arms begin rising, lifting weapon overhead
Weapon reaches apex above head, poised to descend
Full commitment, weapon begins violent descent

damage.notes: In prototype: 1 clean hit = death. High stamina cost but breaks through weak defenses. Long recovery leaves attacker vulnerable if it misses.

specialProperties.description: Can break through parries that don't use extra stamina to widen defense window
